page.title: 16RELIGION.
page.content: Duke Street is a non-denominational school. The children who attend Church regularly go to the Church of England. Gillibrand C.P. school is also non- denominational, but on June 2nd.,1985, 40% of the children attended either a Church of England or Methodist Church. St.Gregory's is a Catholic school belonging to the oldest Catholic Church in Chorley.Most of the children hear Mass at St. Gregory's or St. Anselm's Church. All Saints' is a Church of England school, with the Parish Church almost next door. Within the district there is the Red Bank Mission,Kingdom Hall,St.Gregory's and St. Anselm's,both Roman Catholic, and All Saints' C of E. There is also St.John's C of E in Coppull and Spendmore Methodists. Finally an R.C. Home for mentally handicapped girls.
